entry.title: WIND WARNING , Chetwynd
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:10 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chetwynd Airport 5:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: SSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 90. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few flurries over southern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023
